page.title: 17COUNTY HALL_INTERIOR
page.content: The Council Chamber has a{wall carving by John Rothwell of the Coat of Arms of the County.The furniture is made of elm,and there are seats and desks for 66 councillors.There is the {offical {document}with seals,which gave permission to have County Council. There are banners and ceremonial drums of the Northumberland Ifantry,and a picture of{Prince Charles,}signed when he opened the building.In the entrance hall are wall carvings of famous men and women connected with the County. {Hadrian, St.cuthbert,Hotspur,Bishop { Ridley,Lords Grey and Armstrong,} {Robert and George Stephenson.}There are also photographs of all the local councillors over the past years .Mr Hill is Stobhill's representative.There are 17 offices and 750 people work there.
